title: One Bert Show Member Changed Moe's Life With This Bathroom Trick
description:
If you haven't heard, Moe has a podcast – “In The Moement” - and every week he covers a variety of topics.
In his latest episode, there was a debate about covering your toothbrush at home. This debate lead to another conversation Moe wasn't prepared for. Do you close your toilet lid or not? 
If you don't, there are some things you need to knows about the particles floating around in your bathroom. Listen! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
